description: An illustration of a rock climber, specifically a boulderer, seen from behind as they scale an indoor rock wall: the boulderer has dirty blond hair and they are shirtless, wearing light blue shorts and dark blue climbing shoes, with a bag of chalk hanging from their red belt. The climber has their hands on two light blue rocks and their feet on two reddish-orange rocks; there are a few rocks of varying sizes surrounding them on the wall.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
